ABOUT US

INCPRIN is a fully forward-integrated and comprehensive solutions provider company. Based in Chennai, we serve PAN India. We Engineer, Build and maintain commercial and utility-scale projects that deliver a powerful return on

investment for our clients.

ROBUST PRINTING

â€¢ Robust Printing and Finishing Infrastructure with ample capacity for mass production.

PACKAGING

Capability to produce all kinds of labels and packaging

items catering to Apparel, FMCG, Electronics, Automotive.

Pharma and Education Industry.

INDUSTRY STANDARD

Industry Standards Workflows & Automation Softwares in

the entire production process.

GLOBAL SERVICE

We are providing Pan India service.

Global services with the help of our Global partners.




TECHNOLOGY

We are using cutting edge technology and robust production process in manufacturing in wash care labels, heat transfer, self-adhesive labels, RF, RFID,

mono cartons, rigid boxes, etc.

SUSTAINABILITY

Our main strategy is the usage of sustainability based raw materials & base material in tabeis and packaging production which will help us to align to India Globat carbon reduction program and green earth policies
